SALEvent.Description: State reported by the low level controller. All values except applicationStatus are 1 greater than those reported by the controller for temporary and historical reasons.

item.Description: Basic state. A ControllerState enumeration value. The state names and meanings are the same as standard CSC summaryState, but the numeric values are ordered differently. We report the controller state in addition to summaryState because we need to report a summaryState even when the controller is not connected, and to aid diagnostics, e.g. in case the controller reports an unrecognized state.
Substate in OFFLINE mode. An OfflineSubstate enumeration value.
Substate in ENABLED mode. An EnabledSubstate enumeration value.
Application state. A bitmask of ApplicationStatus enumeration values.

item.Description: Target position at the time specified by "tai".

SALEvent.Description: Specify whether the MTRotator is tracking.

item.Description: Is the MTRotator tracking accurately? The value of Flags_trackingSuccess from the low-level controller.
Is the MTRotator doing badly at tracking? This uses a different algorithm than "tracking". The value of Flags_trackingLost from the low-level controller.
No new tracking command was received in time; tracking fails. The value of Flags_noNewTrackCmdError from the low-level controller.

item.Description: If true the CSC can control the MTRotator; else the Engineering User Interface has control.
